Package in.co.rays.Proj4.model

Class UserModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.co.rays.Proj4.model.UserModel
  • public class UserModel
extends java.lang.Object
    The UserModel class provides data access operations for UserBean. It handles user management functionality such as registration, login, authentication, password management, and CRUD operations with the database. This class also integrates with email utilities to send confirmation, registration, and password-related messages.
    Author:
    Sanjana Gangrade

                              java.lang.String oldPassword,
                              java.lang.String newPassword)
                       throws RecordNotFoundException,
                              ApplicationException
        Changes the password for a given user ID.
        Parameters:
        id - user ID
        oldPassword - current password
        newPassword - new password
        Returns:
        true if password changed successfully
        Throws:
        RecordNotFoundException - if the user does not exist or old password doesn't match
        ApplicationException - if any exception occurs

                              RecordNotFoundException

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if email is sent successfully

        RecordNotFoundException - if login does not exist
